Text: ABBYY FineReader - intellektual'naja sistema opticheskogo raspoznavanija, ili OCR (ot angl. Optical Character Recognition), kotoraja pozvoljaet preobrazovyvat' razlichnye tipy dokumentov (naprimer, bumazhnye dokumenty, PDF-fajly ili fotografii tekstov, poluchennye pri pomowi cifrovoj fotokamery) v redaktiruemyj vid s vozmozhnost'ju polnotekstovogo poiska. Poluchennye rezul'taty mozhno redaktirovat' v programmah Microsofté€Ÿ Office, sohranjat' v raznyh formatah, otpravljat' po jelektronnoj pochte i publikovat' v internete.
If you'd post in English we might understand...

ABBYY FineReader is a highly intelligent OCR (optical character recognition) software for text recognition and creating editable and searchable electronic files from scanned paper documents, PDFs and digital photographs. ABBYY FineReader 10 gives you the power to unlock data in documents and images and transform them into manageable and accessible information.
